snippet.title: Gragyriss, Captor of Princesses Walkthrough
snippet.description:
This is a walkthrough of the game "Gragyriss, Captor of Princesses".

Play the game here: https://www.kongregate.com/games/snowroadgames/gragyriss-captor-of-princesses

You can visit my Patreon page if you want or something:
https://www.patreon.com/awalkthroughlife

Game created by SnowRoadGames
___________
Game description (from creator):
A strategy game about dragon life – devour lambs, grow stronger, raid settlements, fight weak humans, elves and undead, kidnap beautiful princesses

Click an icon to upgrade your buildings. Drag’n’drop various resources to highlighted areas to collect them, feed to your dragon or various other effects.

Upon eating,
Grass increase max hp
Sheep restore current hp
Wolf increase attack power
All of them increase grow progress.

Every new princess gives you new ability to pick, just click on her room once you get one.
___________
#gragyriss
